languages.text: "Джай Хейдари, к вашим услугам. Профессиональный негоциант, искусный торговый посредник и — да украдут мой язык ажи, если совру — самый честный делец на Футфоле. Впрочем, у каждого бывают проблемы, для решения которых даже самых многочисленных достоинств может не хватить. Возможно, человеку с властью и статусом вроде ваших не составит труда помочь человеку с бедой вроде моей?"

traits.locale_text: "Джай Хейдари, к вашим услугам. Профессиональный негоциант, искусный торговый посредник и — да украдут мой язык дивы, если совру — самый честный делец на Футфоле. Впрочем, у каждого бывают проблемы, для решения которых даже самых многочисленных достоинств может не хватить. Возможно, человеку с властью и статусом вроде ваших не составит труда помочь человеку с бедой вроде моей?"

languages.text: "Jae Heydari, at your service. Professional trader, shrewd commercial broker, and — may azhi steal my tongue if I'm lying — the most honest dealer on Footfall. Nonetheless, we all have our problems, and at times even one's many merits aren't enough to solve them. Perhaps it would be no trouble for a person with your kind of power and standing to assist someone with my kind of predicament?"
languages.original_text: "Джай Хейдари, к вашим услугам. Профессиональный негоциант, искусный торговый посредник и — да украдут мой язык ажи, если совру — самый честный делец на Футфоле. Впрочем, у каждого бывают проблемы, для решения которых даже самых многочисленных достоинств может не хватить. Возможно, человеку с властью и статусом вроде ваших не составит труда помочь человеку с бедой вроде моей?"

Nonetheless, we all have our problems, and at times even one's many merits aren't enough to solve them. Perhaps it would be no trouble for a person of your kind of power and standing to assist someone with my kind of predicament?"

Nonetheless, we all have our problems, and at times even one's many merits aren't enough to solve them. Perhaps it would be no trouble for a person with your kind of power and standing to assist someone with my kind of predicament?"

languages.text: 「名はジェイ・ヘイダリ。プロの貿易商にして抜け目のない商取引の仲介人…そして、これは誇張じゃなくてフットフォールでもっとも正直な商人だよ。とはいえ、どんな人にも悩みはつきもの。たくさんの長所があっても解決できないことはいくらでもある。アンタのような権力と地位を持つ人なら、あたしのように苦境に立たされている人を助けるのもたやすいだろうから、少し相談に乗ってもらえないかしら？」
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, at your service. Professional trader, shrewd commercial broker, and — may azhi steal my tongue if I'm lying — the most honest dealer on Footfall. Nonetheless, we all have our problems, and at times even one's many merits aren't enough to solve them. Perhaps it would be no trouble for a person with your kind of power and standing to assist someone with my kind of predicament?"

traits.locale_text: 「名はジェイ・ヘイダリ。プロの貿易商にして抜け目のない商取引の仲介人…そして、これは誇張じゃなくてフットフォールでもっとも正直な商人だよ。とはいえ、どんな人にも悩みはつきもの。たくさんの長所があっても解決できないことはいくらでもある。アンタのような権力と地位を持つ人なら、あたしのように苦境に立たされている人を助けるのもたやすいだろうから、少し相談に乗ってもらえないかしら？」

languages.text: “专业的商人、精明的贸易经纪人，以及落脚港最诚实的买卖人婕伊·海达利，听候你的差遣。只要我说了一句谎话，就叫鬼怪拔掉我的舌头。不过，人人都有可能碰到自己无法解决的难题。我想，像你这样一位有能力、有地位的人，顺手拉我一把，应该不是什么难事吧？”
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, at your service. Professional trader, shrewd commercial broker, and — may azhi steal my tongue if I'm lying — the most honest dealer on Footfall. Nonetheless, we all have our problems, and at times even one's many merits aren't enough to solve them. Perhaps it would be no trouble for a person with your kind of power and standing to assist someone with my kind of predicament?"

traits.locale_text: “专业的商人、精明的贸易经纪人，以及落脚港最诚实的买卖人婕伊·海达利，听候你的差遣。只要我说了一句谎话，就叫鬼怪拔掉我的舌头。不过，人人都有可能碰到自己无法解决的难题。我想，像你这样一位有能力、有地位的人，顺手拉我一把，应该不是什么难事吧？”

languages.text: « Jae Heydari, pour vous servir. Marchande de profession, courtière commerciale avisée, et – que les azhi m'arrachent la langue si je mens – la plus honnête négociante de tout Castel. Cela n'empêche pas que nous ayons tous nos problèmes, et il arrive parfois que les nombreuses qualités dont on peut se flatter ne suffisent pas à les résoudre. Verriez-vous un inconvénient à ce qu'une personne de votre rang et de votre influence vienne en aide à quelqu'un qui se trouve dans une situation aussi délicate que la mienne ? »
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, at your service. Professional trader, shrewd commercial broker, and — may azhi steal my tongue if I'm lying — the most honest dealer on Footfall. Nonetheless, we all have our problems, and at times even one's many merits aren't enough to solve them. Perhaps it would be no trouble for a person with your kind of power and standing to assist someone with my kind of predicament?"

traits.locale_text: « Jae Heydari, pour vous servir. Marchande de profession, courtière commerciale avisée, et – que les azhi m'arrachent la langue si je mens – la plus honnête négociante de tout Castel. Cela n'empêche pas que nous ayons tous nos problèmes, et il arrive parfois que les nombreuses qualités dont on peut se flatter ne suffisent pas à les résoudre. Verriez-vous un inconvénient à ce qu'une personne de votre rang et de votre influence vienne en aide à quelqu'un qui se trouve dans une situation aussi délicate que la mienne ? »

languages.text: «Jae Heydari, a su servicio. Comerciante profesional, sagaz procuradora comercial y, que me corte la lengua un azhi si miento, la mercader más honrada de Paso. Sin embargo, todos tenemos nuestros problemas y a veces ninguno de nuestros muchos méritos no bastan para solucionarlos. Quizás para una persona de su poder y posición no sea un problema ayudar a alguien con mi tipo de dilema...».
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, at your service. Professional trader, shrewd commercial broker, and — may azhi steal my tongue if I'm lying — the most honest dealer on Footfall. Nonetheless, we all have our problems, and at times even one's many merits aren't enough to solve them. Perhaps it would be no trouble for a person with your kind of power and standing to assist someone with my kind of predicament?"

traits.locale_text: «Jae Heydari, a su servicio. Comerciante profesional, sagaz procuradora comercial y, que me corte la lengua un azhi si miento, la mercader más honrada de Paso. Sin embargo, todos tenemos nuestros problemas y a veces ninguno de nuestros muchos méritos no bastan para solucionarlos. Quizás para una persona de su poder y posición no sea un problema ayudar a alguien con mi tipo de dilema...».

languages.text: "Jae Heydari, zu Euren Diensten. Professionelle Händlerin, pfiffige Handelsmaklerin und – möge Azhi meine Zunge in Stahl verwandeln, wenn ich lüge – die ehrlichste Händlerin in ganz Footfall. Allerdings haben wir alle unsere Probleme und mitunter reichen die eigenen Verdienste nicht aus, um sie zu lösen. Vielleicht wäre es für jemanden Eures Ranges und Eurer Reputation ja ein Leichtes, jemanden wie mir aus einer Zwangslage zu helfen?"
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, at your service. Professional trader, shrewd commercial broker, and — may azhi steal my tongue if I'm lying — the most honest dealer on Footfall. Nonetheless, we all have our problems, and at times even one's many merits aren't enough to solve them. Perhaps it would be no trouble for a person with your kind of power and standing to assist someone with my kind of predicament?"

traits.locale_text: "Jae Heydari, zu Euren Diensten. Professionelle Händlerin, pfiffige Handelsmaklerin und – möge Azhi meine Zunge in Stahl verwandeln, wenn ich lüge – die ehrlichste Händlerin in ganz Footfall. Allerdings haben wir alle unsere Probleme und mitunter reichen die eigenen Verdienste nicht aus, um sie zu lösen. Vielleicht wäre es für jemanden Eures Ranges und Eurer Reputation ja ein Leichtes, jemanden wie mir aus einer Zwangslage zu helfen?"

languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, at your service. Professional trader, shrewd commercial broker, and — may azhi steal my tongue if I'm lying — the most honest dealer on Footfall. Nonetheless, we all have our problems, and at times even one's many merits aren't enough to solve them. Perhaps it would be no trouble for a person with your kind of power and standing to assist someone with my kind of predicament?"

languages.text: "Bendeniz Jae Heydari. Hizmetindeyim. Profesyonel bir tacir, kurnaz bir ticaret simsarıyım. Bu meslekte Binliman'ın en dürüstüyümdür. Yalanım varsa azhiler dilimi yutsun. Yine de herkesin kendi derdi var ve insan, zaman zaman bu dertleri kendi hünerleriyle çözemiyor. Belki senin gibi güç ve makam sahibi biri için benim gibi dara düşmüş birisine yardım etmek zahmet olmaz."
languages.original_text: "Jae Heydari, at your service. Professional trader, shrewd commercial broker, and — may azhi steal my tongue if I'm lying — the most honest dealer on Footfall. Nonetheless, we all have our problems, and at times even one's many merits aren't enough to solve them. Perhaps it would be no trouble for a person with your kind of power and standing to assist someone with my kind of predicament?"

traits.locale_text: "Adım Jae Heydari. Hizmetindeyim. Profesyonel bir tacirim, kurnaz bir ticaret simsarıyım, hatta eğer ağzımdan yalan çıkıyorsa azhiler dilimi yutsun ki Binliman'ın en dürüst tüccarıyım. Buna rağmen herkesin kendine özgü dertleri var. İnsan, zaman zaman bu dertleri kendi hünerleriyle çözemiyor. Acaba senin gibi güç ve makam sahibi biri, benim gibi başı dertte olan birisine yardım etmek ister miydi?"
